Title: Jurassic World
Overview: Twenty-two years after the events of Jurassic Park, Isla Nublar now features a fully functioning dinosaur theme park, Jurassic World, as originally envisioned by John Hammond.
Keywords: monster, dna, tyrannosaurus rex, velociraptor, island, sequel, suspense, disaster, escape, dinosaur, amusement park, animal attack, theme park, jurassic park, 3d, animal horror
production_companies: Universal Studios, Amblin Entertainment, Legendary Pictures, Fuji Television Network, Dentsu
Cast: Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard, Irrfan Khan
